SELECT (SELECT row_to_json(sub) FROM (
  SELECT id, numero_facture, lien_pdf, statut
  FROM invoices
  WHERE id = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.safeInvoiceId }}'
    AND tenant_id = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.safeTenantId }}'
) sub) AS invoice

UPDATE invoices
SET lien_pdf = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.lienPdf.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
    updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.safeInvoiceId }}'
  AND tenant_id = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.safeTenantId }}'
RETURNING id, numero_facture, lien_pdf, statut
